metadata.title: CVE-2023-1297 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: Consul and Consul Enterprise's cluster peering implementation contained aflaw whereby a peer cluster with service of the same name as a localservice could corrupt Consul state, resulting in denial of service. Thisvulnerability was resolved in Consul 1.14.5, and 1.15.3

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
